text:
Ed Sheeran's Two-Year-Old Doppelg√§nger Is Freaking The Internet Out Uncanny. Amy Packham Life Writer (Parents) at The Huffington Post UK 
Ed Sheeran has a two-year-old doppelg√§nger and its freaking the internet out. 
Photos of two-year-old Isla Watson, from Exeter, were shared on Twitter on Saturday 18 March and the resemblance is uncanny. 
Isla‚Äôs mum, Zoe, told DevonLive : ‚ÄúIt is completely madness. Everyone has been saying that Isla looks like him for a long time and I never thought anything of it. 
‚ÄúIt was when my sister Stacey put it online that we got loads of comments from people. People have pointed out to her who she looks like and now she likes to watch him on TV.‚Äù Why does this baby look more like Ed Sheeran than Ed Sheeran does? pic.twitter.com/23VPV6dcpm ‚Äî SJB // Ste ‚òÅÔ∏è (@lm_SJB) March 18, 2017
